summary: Teenagers pack a van full of beer and go on the road in search of sexual adventures.
cast: Davey Jones|Bo White|Lilly Bi Peep|Joann Sterling|Melissa Evers|Chris Jordan|Jacqueline Carol|Any Mathieu|Shana McGran|Eric Edwards|Larry Lima|Sylvia Bernstein|Harding Harrison|Jeff Allen|Joe Asaro|Robert McLane|Mike Ledis
title: Blue Summer
